text: Strike out the words OR BEARER and write “A/C Payee Only” (Account Payee Only) near the payee line.
Open activity 3b and show the cheque.
Draw two parallel across lines at the top left corner of the cheque.
Open activity 3c and show the cheque
Both of these methods allow the bank to deposit the money only into the named person’s bank account, and not give cash to whoever brings it.
